name: Sign Up & Login
options: Users can create an account using 1 of 1 or 1 of 2 of methods possible: Facebook, Amazon, Twitter, Google, Email Address, Username, Phone Number (extra charges for sms verification).

name: Submit Jobs
options: Account holders can submit requests for jobs or bookings. Hair appointments or table bookings are good examples of jobs.

name: View Jobs
options: Once a job has been accepted customers can be updated through the stages of the fulfilment process.

name: Save & Edit Booking Details
options: Regular cutomers will benefit from an option that eases the booking flow.

name: Contact form
options: Users can reach you without leaving your site.
